name: Bourbon Old Fashioned
description: When you get right down to it, the Bourbon Old Fashioned is little more than a slug of whiskey, seasoned and sweetened.
directions: Add the sugar, bitters and water into a rocks glass, and stir until sugar is nearly dissolved.
Fill the glass with large ice cubes, add the bourbon, and gently stir to combine the flavors.
Express the oil of an orange peel over the glass, then drop in.
